abstract: It took about an hour for airport security officials to ascertain that Jack Anderson, age 2, about to take a trip to Disney World, was not the Jack Anderson on the federal terrorist watch list.
snippet: It took about an hour for airport security officials to ascertain that Jack Anderson, age 2, about to take a trip to Disney World, was not the Jack Anderson on the federal terrorist watch list.
lead_paragraph: A RESPONSE to last week’s column about the chronic troubles of air travelers came from Christine Anderson, who says she was with her son Jack both times he was told that he was on the terrorist watch list.

headline.main: Not Too Small to Appear on a Big No-Fly Watch List
headline.print_headline: Not Too Small to Appear On a Big No-Fly Watch List
